data.name: The Rack - Pool Billiard
data.detailed_description:
The Rack is the world's most innovative social hub to play 8-Ball/9-Ball in virtual reality. With the realistic ball and table physics, you can put your real-life skills to the test! Whether you're an aspiring VR Pool professional or seek a more casual lifestyle, there is sure to be enough to keep you busy!

Consider yourself a pool shark?
Why not participate in one of the many tournaments, and take home the title!
Or perhaps you are more of a collector, earn coins, to build your arsenal of cues and cosmetic accessories.

Whether you're an aspiring VR Pool professional, or seek the more casual lifestyle, there is sure to be enough to keep you busy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 20xx series or AMD Radeon RX 5xxx series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
